name: Gum-Gum King Kong Gun
text: Main Choose one {Dressrosa} type character, power +6000. After, if your trash has 15 or more cards, this character gains Double Attack for the turn. (This card deals 2 damage.)

effect.text: Choose one {Dressrosa} type character, power +6000. After, if your trash has 15 or more cards, this character gains Double Attack for the turn.

meta.notes: Rarity 'C' is printed in the bottom right corner. The card is an Event with no power or life. The text includes a note about damage: '(This card deals 2 damage.)' which is not a formal ability but part of the rules text.
